mn12:2.2: evaṃ → etaṃ (pts1, mr), parisati → parisatiṃ (bj, pts1)
mn12:44.2: pavivitto sudaṃ → ­pavi­vittas­sudaṃ (bj, pts1), lūkho sudaṃ → lūkhassudaṃ (bj, pts1)
mn12:50.7: sosinno → sosīno (bj, s1, s2, pts1, mr) | so sino (s3) | sosindo (saddanīti)
mn12:57.3: Na kho pana so → na kho paneso (bj, s1-3)
mn12:63.1: Yaṃ kho taṃ → yaṃ kho panetaṃ (bj)
